channel.title: A Weird Sound Slowdown
channel.description:
I found that on the Kagome Kagome Wikipedia page, if I play the song example that is there, usually it slows down any music or sounds that I play during and afterwards. I'm not really sure how much the duration is, but I know it's temporary.
I've exited the page, and the music and sound on my computer goes back to normal. Not sure if the page causes it to slow down everything.
[url]https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kagome_Kagome[/url]
Does anyone else experience this?
I've also determined that other .ogg files I've tested don't do anything.

item.title: A Weird Sound Slowdown
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Yeah, nothing happened with me.

Read full topic

item.title: A Weird Sound Slowdown
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
I found that on the Kagome Kagome Wikipedia page, if I play the song example that is there, usually it slows down any music or sounds that I play during and afterwards. I’m not really sure how much the duration is, but I know it’s temporary.

I’ve exited the page, and the music and sound on my computer goes back to normal. Not sure if the page causes it to slow down everything.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kagome_Kagome

Does anyone else experience this?

I’ve also determined that other .ogg files I’ve tested don’t do anything.
